_header: Whoso thinketh up this careful life
Subjects: fables; satire; abuses of the age
_description: A song on the Times (temp Edward II) with a fable of the Lion, Wolf, Fox, and Ass — twenty-four 8-line stanzas (ababcdcd) and one of 5 lines (ababc)

BLHar913.First Lines:
Whose þenchiþ vp þis carful lifNiȝt and dei
                    þat we beþ inne…
BLHar913.Last Lines: …To whoch ioi vs bringIhesu crist heuen king
BLHar913.Note:
Item is split between ff. 44v-47v and
                        52-52v.
